 1402:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1403:     logger:notice("first",?domain),
 1404:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1405:     ok = file:rename(Log,Log++".old"),
 1406:     ok = file:write_file(Log,""),
 1407:     logger:notice("second",?domain),
 1408:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1409:     {ok,<<"first\n">>} = file:read_file(Log++".old"),
 1410:     {ok,<<"second\n">>} = file:read_file(Log),
 1411:     ok.
 1412: reopen_changed_log(cleanup, _Config) ->
 1413:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1414: 
 1415: rotate_size(Config) ->
 1416:     {Log,_HConfig,_StdHConfig} =
 1417:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1418:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,#{config=>#{max_no_bytes=>1000,
 1419:                                                           max_no_files=>2}}),
 1420: 
 1421:     Str = lists:duplicate(19,$a),
 1422:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],
 1423:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1424:     {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1425:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1426: 
 1427:     logger:notice(Str,?domain),
 1428:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1429:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1430:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1431:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1432: 
 1433:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,51)],
 1434:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1435:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1436:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1437:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1438:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1439: 
 1440:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],
 1441:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1442:     {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1443:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1444:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1445:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1446: 
 1447:     logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1448:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1449:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1450:     {ok,#file_info{size=1005}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1451:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1452:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1453: 
 1454:     ok.
 1455: rotate_size(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1456:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1457: 
 1458: rotate_size_compressed(Config) ->
 1459:     {Log,_HConfig,_StdHConfig} =
 1460:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1461:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1462:                                       #{config=>#{max_no_bytes=>1000,
 1463:                                                   max_no_files=>2,
 1464:                                                   compress_on_rotate=>true}}),
 1465:     Str = lists:duplicate(19,$a),
 1466:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],
 1467:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1468:     {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1469:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1470:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1471: 
 1472:     logger:notice(Str,?domain),
 1473:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1474:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1475:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1476:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1477:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1478:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1479: 
 1480:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,51)],
 1481:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1482:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1483:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1484:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1485:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1486:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1487:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1488:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2.gz"),
 1489: 
 1490:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],
 1491:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1492:     {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1493:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1494:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1495:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1496:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1497:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1498:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2.gz"),
 1499: 
 1500:     logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1501:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1502:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1503:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1504:     {ok,#file_info{size=38}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1505:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1506:     {ok,#file_info{size=35}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1507:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1508:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2.gz"),
 1509: 
 1510:     case os:type() of
 1511:         {unix,_} ->
 1512:             %% Test that logging does not break when directory is deleted at rotation
 1513:             [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,50)],
 1514:             logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1515:             {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1516:             ok = file:del_dir_r(filename:dirname(Log)),
 1517:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1518:             logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1519:             logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1520:             logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1521:             {ok,#file_info{size=5}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1522:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1523:             {ok,#file_info{size=25}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1524:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1525:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1526:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1527:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2.gz"),
 1528: 
 1529:             %% Test that logging without sync does not break
 1530:             %% when directory is deleted at rotation
 1531:             ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE, #{config=>#{ file_check => 10000 } }),
 1532:             [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,49)],
 1533:             [logger:notice("bbbb",?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,3)],
 1534:             logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1535:             {ok,#file_info{size=1000}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1536:             ok = file:del_dir_r(filename:dirname(Log)),
 1537:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1538:             logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1539:             logger:notice("bbbb",?domain),
 1540:             logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1541:             {ok,#file_info{size=5}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1542:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1543:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1544:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1545:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1546:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1547:             {error,enoent} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2.gz");
 1548:         {win32,_} ->
 1549:             ok
 1550:     end,
 1551: 
 1552:     ok.
 1553: rotate_size_compressed(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1554:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1555: 
 1556: rotate_size_reopen(Config) ->
 1557:     {Log,_HConfig,_StdHConfig} =
 1558:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1559:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,#{config=>#{max_no_bytes=>1000,
 1560:                                                           max_no_files=>2}}),
 1561: 
 1562:     Str = lists:duplicate(19,$a),
 1563:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,40)],
 1564:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1565:     {ok,#file_info{size=800}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1566: 
 1567:     {ok,HConfig} = logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1568:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1569:     ok = logger:add_handler(?MODULE,maps:get(module,HConfig),HConfig),
 1570:     {ok,#file_info{size=800}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1571: 
 1572:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,40)],
 1573:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1574:     {ok,#file_info{size=580}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1575:     {ok,#file_info{size=1020}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1576:     ok.
 1577: rotate_size_reopen(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1578:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1579: 
 1580: %% Test that it is possible to start the handler when there
 1581: %% exists a large file that needs rotating at startup.
 1582: rotate_on_start_compressed() ->
 1583:     [{timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
 1584: rotate_on_start_compressed(Config) ->
 1585: 
 1586:     application:ensure_all_started(os_mon),
 1587: 
 1588:     case file_SUITE:disc_free(?config(priv_dir, Config)) of
 1589:         N when N >= 5 * (1 bsl 30), is_integer(N) ->
 1590:             ct:pal("Free disk: ~w KByte~n", [N]),
 1591:             Log = get_handler_log_name(rotate_on_start_compressed, Config),
 1592: 
 1593:             %% Write a 1 GB file to disk
 1594:             {ok, D} = file:open(Log,[write]),
 1595:             [file:write(D,<<0:(1024*1024*8)>>) || _I <- lists:seq(1,1024)],
 1596:             file:close(D),
 1597: 
 1598:             NumOfReqs = 500,
 1599: 
 1600:             %% Start the handler that will compress and rotate the existing file
 1601:             ok = logger:add_handler(?MODULE,
 1602:                                     logger_std_h,
 1603:                                     #{config => #{sync_mode_qlen => 2,
 1604:                                                   drop_mode_qlen => NumOfReqs+1,
 1605:                                                   flush_qlen => 2*NumOfReqs,
 1606:                                                   burst_limit_enable => false,
 1607:                                                   max_no_bytes=>1048576,
 1608:                                                   max_no_files=>10,
 1609:                                                   compress_on_rotate=>true,
 1610:                                                   type => {file,Log}},
 1611:                                       filter_default=>stop,
 1612:                                       filters=>filter_only_this_domain(?MODULE),
 1613:                                       formatter=>{?MODULE,op}}),
 1614: 
 1615:             %% Wait for compression to start
 1616:             timer:sleep(50),
 1617: 
 1618:             %% We send a burst here in order to make sure that the
 1619:             %% compression has time to take place. The burst will
 1620:             %% trigger sync mode which means that there will be
 1621:             %% calls made to the file controller process which
 1622:             %% in turn means that when the burst is done the
 1623:             %% compression is done.
 1624:             send_burst({n,NumOfReqs}, seq, {chars,79}, notice),
 1625:             Lines = count_lines(Log),
 1626:             NumOfReqs = Lines,
 1627:             {ok,#file_info{size=1043656}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1628:             ok;
 1629:         _ ->
 1630:             {skip,"Disk not large enough"}
 1631:     end.
 1632: rotate_on_start_compressed(cleanup,Config) ->
 1633:     application:stop(os_mon),
 1634:     application:stop(sasl),
 1635:     file:delete(get_handler_log_name(rotate_on_start_compressed, Config)),
 1636:     file:delete(get_handler_log_name(rotate_on_start_compressed, Config)++".0.gz"),
 1637:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1638: 
 1639: rotation_opts(Config) ->
 1640:     {Log,_HConfig,StdHConfig} =
 1641:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1642:     #{max_no_bytes:=infinity,
 1643:       max_no_files:=0,
 1644:       compress_on_rotate:=false} = StdHConfig,
 1645: 
 1646:     %% Test bad rotation config
 1647:     {error,{invalid_config,_,_}} =
 1648:         logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,config,#{max_no_bytes=>0}),
 1649:     {error,{invalid_config,_,_}} =
 1650:         logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,config,#{max_no_files=>infinity}),
 1651:     {error,{invalid_config,_,_}} =
 1652:         logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,config,
 1653:                                      #{compress_on_rotate=>undefined}),
 1654: 
 1655: 
 1656:     %% Test good rotation config - start with no rotation
 1657:     Str = lists:duplicate(19,$a),
 1658:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 1659:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1660:     {ok,#file_info{size=200}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1661:     [] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1662: 
 1663:     %% Turn on rotation, check that existing file is rotated since its
 1664:     %% size exceeds max_no_bytes
 1665:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1666:                                       config,
 1667:                                       #{max_no_bytes=>100,
 1668:                                         max_no_files=>2}),
 1669:     timer:sleep(100), % give some time to execute config_changed
 1670:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1671:     Log0 = Log++".0",
 1672:     {ok,#file_info{size=200}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1673:     [Log0] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1674: 
 1675:     %% Fill all logs
 1676:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,13)],
 1677:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1678:     {ok,#file_info{size=20}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1679:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1680:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1681:     [_,_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1682: 
 1683:     %% Extend size and count and check that nothing changes with existing files
 1684:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1685:                                       config,
 1686:                                       #{max_no_bytes=>200,
 1687:                                         max_no_files=>3}),
 1688:     timer:sleep(100), % give some time to execute config_changed
 1689:     {ok,#file_info{size=20}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1690:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1691:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1692:     [_,_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1693: 
 1694:     %% Add more log events and see that extended size and count works
 1695:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 1696:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1697:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1698:     {ok,#file_info{size=220}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1699:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1700:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".2"),
 1701:     [_,_,_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1702: 
 1703:     %% Reduce count and check that archive files that exceed the new
 1704:     %% count are moved
 1705:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1706:                                       config,
 1707:                                       #{max_no_files=>1}),
 1708:     timer:sleep(100), % give some time to execute config_changed
 1709:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1710:     {ok,#file_info{size=220}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1711:     [Log0] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1712: 
 1713:     %% Extend size and count again, and turn on compression. Check
 1714:     %% that archives are compressed
 1715:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1716:                                       config,
 1717:                                       #{max_no_bytes=>100,
 1718:                                         max_no_files=>2,
 1719:                                         compress_on_rotate=>true}),
 1720:     timer:sleep(100), % give some time to execute config_changed
 1721:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1722:     Log0gz = Log0++".gz",
 1723:     {ok,#file_info{size=29}} = file:read_file_info(Log0gz),
 1724:     [Log0gz] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1725: 
 1726:     %% Fill all logs
 1727:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,13)],
 1728:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1729:     {ok,#file_info{size=20}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1730:     {ok,#file_info{size=29}} = file:read_file_info(Log0gz),
 1731:     {ok,#file_info{size=29}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1.gz"),
 1732:     [_,_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1733: 
 1734:     %% Reduce count and turn off compression. Check that archives that
 1735:     %% exceeds the new count are removed, and the rest are
 1736:     %% uncompressed.
 1737:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1738:                                       config,
 1739:                                       #{max_no_files=>1,
 1740:                                         compress_on_rotate=>false}),
 1741:     timer:sleep(100), % give some time to execute config_changed
 1742:     {ok,#file_info{size=20}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1743:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log0),
 1744:     [Log0] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1745: 
 1746:     %% Check that config and handler state agree on the current rotation settings
 1747:     {ok,#{config:=#{max_no_bytes:=100,
 1748:                     max_no_files:=1,
 1749:                     compress_on_rotate:=false}}} =
 1750:          logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1751:     #{cb_state:=#{handler_state:=#{max_no_bytes:=100,
 1752:                                    max_no_files:=1,
 1753:                                    compress_on_rotate:=false}}} =
 1754:         logger_olp:info(h_proc_name()),
 1755:     ok.
 1756: rotation_opts(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1757:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1758: 
 1759: rotation_opts_restart_handler(Config) ->
 1760:     {Log,_HConfig,_StdHConfig} =
 1761:         start_handler(?MODULE, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
 1762:     ok = logger:update_handler_config(?MODULE,
 1763:                                       config,
 1764:                                       #{max_no_bytes=>100,
 1765:                                         max_no_files=>2}),
 1766: 
 1767:     %% Fill all logs
 1768:     Str = lists:duplicate(19,$a),
 1769:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,15)],
 1770:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1771:     {ok,#file_info{size=60}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1772:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1773:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1774:     [_,_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1775: 
 1776:     %% Stop/start handler and turn off rotation. Check that archives are removed.
 1777:     {ok,#{config:=StdHConfig1}=HConfig1} = logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1778:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1779:     ok = logger:add_handler(
 1780:            ?MODULE,logger_std_h,
 1781:            HConfig1#{config=>StdHConfig1#{max_no_bytes=>infinity}}),
 1782:     timer:sleep(100),
 1783:     {ok,#file_info{size=60}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1784:     [] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1785: 
 1786:     %% Add some log events and check that file is no longer rotated.
 1787:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 1788:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1789:     {ok,#file_info{size=260}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1790:     [] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1791: 
 1792:     %% Stop/start handler and turn on rotation. Check that file is rotated.
 1793:     {ok,#{config:=StdHConfig2}=HConfig2} = logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1794:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1795:     ok = logger:add_handler(
 1796:            ?MODULE,logger_std_h,
 1797:            HConfig2#{config=>StdHConfig2#{max_no_bytes=>100,
 1798:                                           max_no_files=>2}}),
 1799:     timer:sleep(100),
 1800:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1801:     {ok,#file_info{size=260}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1802:     [_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1803: 
 1804:     %% Fill all logs
 1805:     [logger:notice(Str,?domain) || _ <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 1806:     logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 1807:     {ok,#file_info{size=80}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1808:     {ok,#file_info{size=120}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1809:     {ok,#file_info{size=260}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".1"),
 1810: 
 1811:     %% Stop/start handler, reduce count and turn on compression. Check
 1812:     %% that excess archives are removed, and the rest compressed.
 1813:     {ok,#{config:=StdHConfig3}=HConfig3} = logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1814:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1815:     ok = logger:add_handler(
 1816:            ?MODULE,logger_std_h,
 1817:            HConfig3#{config=>StdHConfig3#{max_no_bytes=>75,
 1818:                                           max_no_files=>1,
 1819:                                           compress_on_rotate=>true}}),
 1820:     timer:sleep(500),
 1821:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1822:     {ok,#file_info{size=29}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0.gz"),
 1823:     [_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1824: 
 1825:     %% Stop/start handler and turn off compression. Check that archives
 1826:     %% are decompressed.
 1827:     {ok,#{config:=StdHConfig4}=HConfig4} = logger:get_handler_config(?MODULE),
 1828:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 1829:     ok = logger:add_handler(
 1830:            ?MODULE,logger_std_h,
 1831:            HConfig4#{config=>StdHConfig4#{compress_on_rotate=>false}}),
 1832:     timer:sleep(100),
 1833:     {ok,#file_info{size=0}} = file:read_file_info(Log),
 1834:     {ok,#file_info{size=80}} = file:read_file_info(Log++".0"),
 1835:     [_] = filelib:wildcard(Log++".*"),
 1836: 
 1837:     ok.
 1838: rotation_opts_restart_handler(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1839:     ok = stop_handler(?MODULE).
 1840: 
 1841: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1842: %%%
 1843: send_requests(TO, Reqs = [{Mod,Func,Args,Res}|Rs]) ->
 1844:     receive
 1845:         {From,finish} ->
 1846:             From ! {self(),Reqs}
 1847:     after
 1848:         TO ->
 1849:             Result = apply(Mod,Func,Args),
 1850:             send_requests(TO, Rs ++ [{Mod,Func,Args,[Result|Res]}])
 1851:     end.
 1852:             
 1853: 
 1854: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1855: %%% 
 1856: start_handler(Name, TTY, _Config) when TTY == standard_io;
 1857:                                        TTY == standard_error->
 1858:     ok = logger:add_handler(Name,
 1859:                             logger_std_h,
 1860:                             #{config => #{type => TTY},
 1861:                               filter_default=>stop,
 1862:                               filters=>filter_only_this_domain(Name),
 1863:                               formatter=>{?MODULE,op}}),
 1864:     {ok,HConfig = #{config := StdHConfig}} = logger:get_handler_config(Name),
 1865:     {HConfig,StdHConfig};
 1866: 
 1867: start_handler(Name, FuncName, Config) ->
 1868:     Log = get_handler_log_name(FuncName, Config),
 1869:     ct:pal("Logging to ~tp", [Log]),
 1870:     Type = {file,Log},
 1871:     _ = file_delete(Log),
 1872:     ok = logger:add_handler(Name,
 1873:                             logger_std_h,
 1874:                             #{config => #{type => Type},
 1875:                               filter_default=>stop,
 1876:                               filters=>filter_only_this_domain(Name),
 1877:                               formatter=>{?MODULE,op}}),
 1878:     {ok,HConfig = #{config := StdHConfig}} = logger:get_handler_config(Name),
 1879:     {Log,HConfig,StdHConfig}.
 1880: 
 1881: get_handler_log_name(FuncName, Config) ->
 1882:     filename:join([?config(priv_dir,Config),
 1883:                    FuncName,
 1884:                    lists:concat([FuncName,".log"])]).
 1885: 
 1886: filter_only_this_domain(Name) ->
 1887:     [{remote_gl,{fun logger_filters:remote_gl/2,stop}},
 1888:      {domain,{fun logger_filters:domain/2,{log,super,[Name]}}}].
 1889: 
 1890: stop_handler(Name) ->
 1891:     R = logger:remove_handler(Name),
 1892:     ct:pal("Handler ~p stopped! Result: ~p", [Name,R]),
 1893:     R.
 1894: 
 1895: count_lines(File) ->
 1896:     wait_until_written(File, -1),
 1897:     count_lines1(File).
 1898: 
 1899: wait_until_written(File, Sz) ->
 1900:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1901:     case file:read_file_info(File) of
 1902:         {error,enoent} when Sz == -1 ->
 1903:             wait_until_written(File, Sz);
 1904:         {ok,#file_info{size = Sz}} ->
 1905:             timer:sleep(1000),
 1906:             case file:read_file_info(File) of
 1907:                 {ok,#file_info{size = Sz}} ->
 1908:                     ok;
 1909:                 {ok,#file_info{size = Sz1}} ->
 1910:                     wait_until_written(File, Sz1)
 1911:             end;
 1912:         {ok,#file_info{size = Sz1}} ->
 1913:             wait_until_written(File, Sz1)
 1914:     end.
 1915:     
 1916: count_lines1(File) ->
 1917:     {_,Dev} = file:open(File, [read]),
 1918:     Lines = count_lines2(Dev, 0),
 1919:     file:close(Dev),
 1920:     Lines.
 1921: 
 1922: count_lines2(Dev, LC) ->
 1923:     case file:read_line(Dev) of
 1924:         {ok,"Handler logger_std_h_SUITE " ++_} ->
 1925:             %% Not counting handler info
 1926:             count_lines2(Dev,LC);
 1927:         {ok,_} ->
 1928:             count_lines2(Dev,LC+1);
 1929:         eof -> LC
 1930:     end.
 1931: 
 1932: send_burst(NorT, Type, {chars,Sz}, Class) ->
 1933:     Text = [34 + rand:uniform(126-34) || _ <- lists:seq(1,Sz)],
 1934:     case NorT of
 1935:         {n,N} ->
 1936:             %% process_flag(priority, high),
 1937:             send_n_burst(N, Type, Text, Class),
 1938:             %% process_flag(priority, normal),
 1939:             N;
 1940:         {t,T} ->
 1941:             ct:pal("Sending messages sequentially for ~w ms", [T]),
 1942:             T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1943:             send_t_burst(T0, T, Text, Class, 0)
 1944:     end.
 1945: 
 1946: send_n_burst(0, _, _Text, _Class) ->
 1947:     ok;
 1948: send_n_burst(N, seq, Text, Class) ->
 1949:     ok = logger:Class(Text, ?domain),
 1950:     send_n_burst(N-1, seq, Text, Class);
 1951: send_n_burst(N, {spawn,Ps,TO}, Text, Class) ->
 1952:     ct:pal("~w processes each sending ~w messages", [Ps,N]),
 1953:     MRefs = [begin if TO == 0 -> ok; true -> timer:sleep(TO) end,
 1954:                    monitor(process,spawn_link(per_proc_fun(N,Text,Class,X)))
 1955:              end || X <- lists:seq(1,Ps)],
 1956:     lists:foreach(fun(MRef) ->
 1957:                           receive
 1958:                               {'DOWN', MRef, _, _, _} ->
 1959:                                   ok
 1960:                           end
 1961:                   end, MRefs),
 1962:     ct:pal("Message burst sent", []),
 1963:     ok.
 1964: 
 1965: send_t_burst(T0, T, Text, Class, N) ->
 1966:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 1967:     if (T1-T0) > T ->
 1968:             N;
 1969:        true ->
 1970:             ok = logger:Class(Text, ?domain),
 1971:             send_t_burst(T0, T, Text, Class, N+1)
 1972:     end.
 1973: 
 1974: per_proc_fun(N,Text,Class,X) when X rem 2 == 0 ->
 1975:     fun() ->
 1976:             process_flag(priority,high),
 1977:             send_n_burst(N, seq, Text, Class)
 1978:     end;
 1979: per_proc_fun(N,Text,Class,_) ->
 1980:     fun() ->
 1981:             send_n_burst(N, seq, Text, Class)
 1982:     end.
 1983: 
 1984: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 1985: %%% Formatter callback
 1986: %%% Using this to send the formatted string back to the test case
 1987: %%% process - so it can check for logged events.
 1988: format(_,bad_return) ->
 1989:     bad_return;
 1990: format(_,crash) ->
 1991:     erlang:error(formatter_crashed);
 1992: format(#{msg:={string,String0}},no_nl) ->
 1993:     String = unicode:characters_to_list(String0),
 1994:     String;
 1995: format(#{msg:={string,String0}},nl) ->
 1996:     String = unicode:characters_to_list(String0),
 1997:     String++"\n";
 1998: format(#{msg:={string,String0}},op) ->
 1999:     String = unicode:characters_to_list(String0),
 2000:     String++"\n";
 2001: format(#{msg:={report,#{label:={supervisor,progress}}}},op) ->
 2002:     "";
 2003: format(#{msg:={report,#{label:={gen_server,terminate}}}},op) ->
 2004:     "";
 2005: format(#{msg:={report,#{label:={proc_lib,crash}}}},op) ->
 2006:     "";
 2007: format(#{msg:={F,A}},OpOrPid) when is_list(F), is_list(A) ->
 2008:     String = lists:flatten(io_lib:format(F,A)),
 2009:     if is_pid(OpOrPid) -> OpOrPid ! {log,String};
 2010:        true -> ok
 2011:     end,
 2012:     String++"\n";
 2013: format(#{msg:={string,String0}},Pid) ->
 2014:     String = unicode:characters_to_list(String0),
 2015:     Pid ! {log,String},
 2016:     String++"\n".
 2017: 
 2018: add_remove_instance_nofile(Type) ->
 2019:     ok = logger:add_handler(?MODULE,logger_std_h,
 2020:                             #{config => #{type => Type},
 2021:                               filter_default=>stop,
 2022:                               filters=>?DEFAULT_HANDLER_FILTERS([?MODULE]),
 2023:                               formatter=>{?MODULE,self()}}),
 2024:     Pid = whereis(h_proc_name()),
 2025:     true = is_pid(Pid),
 2026:     group_leader(group_leader(),Pid), % to get printouts in test log
 2027:     logger:notice(M1=?msg,?domain),
 2028:     ?check(M1),
 2029:     %% check that sync doesn't do damage even if not relevant
 2030:     ok = logger_std_h:filesync(?MODULE),
 2031:     ok = logger:remove_handler(?MODULE),
 2032:     timer:sleep(500),
 2033:     undefined = whereis(h_proc_name()),
 2034:     logger:notice(?msg,?domain),
 2035:     ?check_no_log,
 2036:     ok.
 2037: 
 2038: logger_std_h_remove() ->
 2039:     logger:remove_handler(?MODULE).
 2040: logger_std_h_remove(Id) ->
 2041:     logger:remove_handler(Id).
 2042: 
 2043: try_read_file(FileName, Expected, Time) when Time > 0 ->
 2044:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 2045:         Expected ->
 2046:             ok;
 2047:         Error = {error,_Reason} ->
 2048:             ct:pal("Can't read ~tp: ~tp", [FileName,Error]),
 2049:             erlang:error(Error);
 2050:         Got ->
 2051:             ct:pal("try_read_file got ~tp", [Got]),
 2052:             timer:sleep(500),
 2053:             try_read_file(FileName, Expected, Time-500)
 2054:     end;
 2055: try_read_file(FileName, Expected, _) ->
 2056:     ct:pal("Missing pattern ~tp in ~tp", [Expected,FileName]),
 2057:     erlang:error({error,missing_expected_pattern}).
 2058: 
 2059: try_match_file(FileName, Pattern, Time) ->
 2060:     try_match_file(FileName, Pattern, Time, <<>>).
 2061: 
 2062: try_match_file(FileName, Pattern, Time, _) when Time > 0 ->
 2063:     case file:read_file(FileName) of
 2064:         {ok, Bin} ->
 2065:             case re:run(Bin,Pattern,[{capture,none}]) of
 2066:                 match ->
 2067:                     unicode:characters_to_list(Bin);
 2068:                 _ ->
 2069:                     timer:sleep(100),
 2070:                     try_match_file(FileName, Pattern, Time-100, Bin)
 2071:             end;
 2072:         Error ->
 2073:             erlang:error(Error)
 2074:     end;
 2075: try_match_file(_,Pattern,_,Incorrect) ->
 2076:     ct:pal("try_match_file did not match pattern: ~p~nGot: ~p~n",
 2077:            [Pattern,Incorrect]),
 2078:     erlang:error({error,not_matching_pattern,Pattern,Incorrect}).
 2079: 
 2080: repeat_until_ok(Fun, N) ->
 2081:     repeat_until_ok(Fun, 0, N, undefined).
 2082: 
 2083: repeat_until_ok(_Fun, Stop, Stop, Reason) ->
 2084:     {fails,Reason};
 2085: 
 2086: repeat_until_ok(Fun, C, Stop, FirstReason) ->
 2087:     if C > 0 -> timer:sleep(5000);
 2088:        true -> ok
 2089:     end,
 2090:     try Fun() of
 2091:         Result ->
 2092:             {ok,{C,Result}}
 2093:     catch
 2094:         _:Reason:Stack ->
 2095:             ct:pal("Test fails: ~p (~p)~n", [Reason,hd(Stack)]),
 2096:             if FirstReason == undefined ->
 2097:                     repeat_until_ok(Fun, C+1, Stop, {Reason,Stack});
 2098:                true ->
 2099:                     repeat_until_ok(Fun, C+1, Stop, FirstReason)
 2100:             end
 2101:     end.
 2102:     
 2103: 
 2104: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 2105: %%% 
 2106: start_op_trace() ->
 2107:     TraceFun = fun({trace,_,call,{_Mod,Func,Details}}, Pid) ->
 2108:                        Pid ! {trace_call,Func,Details},
 2109:                        Pid;
 2110:                   ({trace,_,return_from,{_Mod,Func,_},RetVal}, Pid) ->
 2111:                        Pid ! {trace_return,Func,RetVal},
 2112:                        Pid
 2113:                end,
 2114:     TRecvPid = spawn_link(fun() -> trace_receiver(5000) end),
 2115:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process, {TraceFun, TRecvPid}),
 2116: 
 2117:     {ok,_} = dbg:p(whereis(h_proc_name()), [c]),
 2118:     {ok,_} = dbg:p(self(), [c]),
 2119: 
 2120:     MS1 = dbg:fun2ms(fun([_]) -> return_trace() end),
 2121:     {ok,_} = dbg:tpl(logger_h_common, check_load, 1, MS1),
 2122: 
 2123:     {ok,_} = dbg:tpl(logger_h_common, flush_log_requests, 2, []),
 2124: 
 2125:     MS2 = dbg:fun2ms(fun([_,mode]) -> return_trace() end),
 2126:     {ok,_} = dbg:tpl(ets, lookup, 2, MS2),
 2127: 
 2128:     ct:pal("Tracing started!", []),
 2129:     TRecvPid.
 2130:     
 2131: stop_op_trace(TRecvPid) ->
 2132:     stop_clear(),
 2133:     unlink(TRecvPid),
 2134:     exit(TRecvPid, kill),
 2135:     ok.
 2136: 
 2137: find_mode(flush, Events) ->
 2138:     lists:any(fun({trace_call,flush_log_requests,[_,_]}) -> true;
 2139:                  (_) -> false
 2140:               end, Events);
 2141: find_mode(Mode, Events) ->
 2142:     lists:keymember([{mode,Mode}], 3, Events).
 2143: 
 2144: %% find_switch(_From, To, Events) ->
 2145: %%     try lists:foldl(fun({trace_return,check_load,{To,_,_,_}},
 2146: %%                         {trace_call,check_load,[#{mode := From}]}) ->
 2147: %%                             throw(match);
 2148: %%                        (Event, _) ->
 2149: %%                             Event
 2150: %%                     end, undefined, Events) of
 2151: %%         _ -> false
 2152: %%     catch
 2153: %%         throw:match -> true
 2154: %%     end.
 2155: 
 2156: analyse_trace(TRecvPid, TestFun) ->
 2157:     TRecvPid ! {test,self(),TestFun},
 2158:     receive
 2159:         {result,TRecvPid,Result} ->
 2160:             Result
 2161:     after
 2162:         60000 ->
 2163:             fails
 2164:     end.
 2165: 
 2166: trace_receiver(IdleT) ->
 2167:     Msgs = receive_until_idle(IdleT, 5, []),
 2168:     ct:pal("~w trace events generated", [length(Msgs)]),
 2169:     analyse(Msgs).
 2170: 
 2171: receive_until_idle(IdleT, WaitN, Msgs) ->
 2172:     receive
 2173:         Msg = {trace_call,_,_} ->
 2174:             receive_until_idle(IdleT, 5, [Msg | Msgs]);
 2175:         Msg = {trace_return,_,_} ->
 2176:             receive_until_idle(IdleT, 5, [Msg | Msgs])
 2177:     after
 2178:         IdleT ->
 2179:             if WaitN == 0 ->
 2180:                     Msgs;
 2181:                true ->
 2182:                     receive_until_idle(IdleT, WaitN-1, Msgs)
 2183:             end
 2184:     end.
 2185:           
 2186: analyse(Msgs) ->
 2187:     receive
 2188:         {test,From,TestFun} ->
 2189:             From ! {result,self(),TestFun(Msgs)},
 2190:             analyse(Msgs)
 2191:     end.
 2192: 
 2193: start_tracer(Trace,Expected) ->
 2194:     Pid = self(),
 2195:     FileCtrlPid = maps:get(file_ctrl_pid,
 2196:                            maps:get(handler_state,
 2197:                                     maps:get(cb_state,
 2198:                                              logger_olp:info(h_proc_name())))),
 2199:     {ok,_} = dbg:tracer(process,{fun tracer/2,{Pid,Expected}}),
 2200:     dbg:p(whereis(h_proc_name()),[c]),
 2201:     dbg:p(FileCtrlPid,[c]),
 2202:     tpl(Trace),
 2203:     ok.
 2204: 
 2205: tpl([{M,F,A}|Trace]) ->
 2206:     tpl([{{M,F,A},[]}|Trace]);
 2207: tpl([{{M,F,A},MS}|Trace]) ->
 2208:     {ok,Match} = dbg:tpl(M,F,A,MS),
 2209:     case lists:keyfind(matched,1,Match) of
 2210:         {_,_,1} ->
 2211:             ok;
 2212:         _ ->
 2213:             stop_clear(),
 2214:             throw({skip,"Can't trace "++atom_to_list(M)++":"++
 2215:                        atom_to_list(F)++"/"++integer_to_list(A)})
 2216:     end,
 2217:     tpl(Trace);
 2218: tpl([]) ->
 2219:     ok.
 2220: 
 2221: stop_clear() ->
 2222:     dbg:stop(),
 2223:     %% Remove tracer from all processes in order to eliminate
 2224:     %% race conditions.
 2225:     erlang:trace(all,false,[all]).
 2226: 
 2227: tracer({trace,_,call,{logger_h_common,handle_cast,[Op|_]}},
 2228:        {Pid,[{Mod,Func,Op}|Expected]}) ->
 2229:     maybe_tracer_done(Pid,Expected,{Mod,Func,Op});
 2230: tracer({trace,_,call,{Mod=logger_std_h,Func=write_to_dev,[Data,_]}},
 2231:        {Pid,[{Mod,Func,Data}|Expected]}) ->
 2232:     maybe_tracer_done(Pid,Expected,{Mod,Func,Data});
 2233: tracer({trace,_,call,{Mod,Func,_}}, {Pid,[{Mod,Func}|Expected]}) ->
 2234:     maybe_tracer_done(Pid,Expected,{Mod,Func});
 2235: tracer({trace,_,call,{logger_h_common = Mod,handle_info = Func,[{timeout,_,Op},_S]}},
 2236:        {Pid,[{Mod,Func,{timeout,Op}}|Expected]}) ->
 2237:     maybe_tracer_done(Pid,Expected,{Mod,Func});
 2238: tracer({trace,_,call,Call}, {Pid,Expected}) ->
 2239:     ct:log("Tracer got unexpected: ~p~nExpected: ~p~n",[Call,Expected]),
 2240:     Pid ! {tracer_got_unexpected,Call,Expected},
 2241:     {Pid,Expected}.
 2242: 
 2243: maybe_tracer_done(Pid,[]=Expected,Got) ->
 2244:     ct:log("Tracer got: ~p~n",[Got]),
 2245:     Pid ! {tracer_done,0},
 2246:     {Pid,Expected};
 2247: maybe_tracer_done(Pid,[{no_more,T}]=Expected,Got) ->
 2248:     ct:log("Tracer got: ~p~n",[Got]),
 2249:     Pid ! {tracer_done,T},
 2250:     {Pid,Expected};
 2251: maybe_tracer_done(Pid,Expected,Got) ->
 2252:     ct:log("Tracer got: ~p~n",[Got]),
 2253:     {Pid,Expected}.
 2254: 
 2255: check_tracer(T) ->
 2256:     check_tracer(T,fun() -> ct:fail({timeout,tracer}) end).
 2257: check_tracer(T,TimeoutFun) ->
 2258:     receive
 2259:         {tracer_done,Delay} ->
 2260:             %% Possibly wait Delay ms to check that no unexpected
 2261:             %% traces are received
 2262:             check_tracer(Delay,fun() -> ok end);
 2263:         {tracer_got_unexpected,Got,Expected} ->
 2264:             stop_clear(),
 2265:             ct:fail({tracer_got_unexpected,Got,Expected})
 2266:     after T ->
 2267:             stop_clear(),
 2268:             TimeoutFun()
 2269:     end.
 2270: 
 2271: escape([C|Rest]) ->
 2272:     %% The characters that have to be escaped in a regex
 2273:     case lists:member(C,"[-[\]{}()*+?.,\\^$|#\s]") of
 2274:         true ->
 2275:             [$\\,C|escape(Rest)];
 2276:         false ->
 2277:             [C|escape(Rest)]
 2278:     end;
 2279: escape([]) ->
 2280:     [].
 2281: 
 2282: h_proc_name() ->
 2283:     h_proc_name(?MODULE).
 2284: h_proc_name(Name) ->
 2285:     ?name_to_reg_name(logger_std_h,Name).
 2286: 
 2287: wait_for_process_up(T) ->
 2288:     wait_for_process_up(?MODULE, h_proc_name(), T).
 2289: 
 2290: wait_for_process_up(Name, RegName, T) ->
 2291:     N = (T div 500) + 1,
 2292:     wait_for_process_up1(Name, RegName, N).
 2293: 
 2294: wait_for_process_up1(_Name, _RegName, 0) ->
 2295:     error;
 2296: wait_for_process_up1(Name, RegName, N) ->
 2297:     timer:sleep(500),
 2298:     case whereis(RegName) of
 2299:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2300:             case logger:get_handler_config(Name) of
 2301:                 {ok,_} ->
 2302:                     %% ct:pal("Process ~p up (~p tries left)",[Name,N]),
 2303:                     {ok,Pid};
 2304:                 _ ->
 2305:                     wait_for_process_up1(Name, RegName, N-1)
 2306:             end;
 2307:         undefined ->
 2308:             %% ct:pal("Waiting for process ~p (~p tries left)",[Name,N]),
 2309:             wait_for_process_up1(Name, RegName, N-1)
 2310:     end.
 2311: 
 2312: filesync_rep_int() ->
 2313:     case (fun() -> is_atom(?FILESYNC_REPEAT_INTERVAL) end)() of
 2314:         true  -> 5500;
 2315:         false -> ?FILESYNC_REPEAT_INTERVAL + 500
 2316:     end.
 2317: 
 2318: 
 2319: file_delete(Log) ->
 2320:    file:delete(Log).
